data.text:
Thank you to everyone who came out to our 2024 Field Leadership Forum! We had some amazing speakers who enlightened our workforce on vital topics such as safety, leadership, teamwork, the latest industry developments, and health. It was an incredible event to be a part of, and I am immensely proud of our Sturgeon Electric California leaders for showing up and actively participating in these important conversations. Your dedication and engagement are what drive our success. Here's to continuing our journey towards excellence together! #Leadership #Teamwork #Safety #Health #SturgeonElectricCalifornia #2024FieldLeadership

Thank you, Codey Gandy for coming on the podcast and joining us at our leadership conference. The conversation we had was truly impactful, and it was great to connect both as fathers and leaders. Your powerful influence as our Keynote Speaker, and your unique ability to educate us on understanding perspective and personal tendencies, helped me personally improve as an Echelon Front student. On behalf of Sturgeon Electric California, thank you! Check out the latest episode: üîó https://lnkd.in/g3FmzhZv

The 2023 International Lineman's Rodeo was an awesome experience once again. With the help of Paul Salgado, we proudly represented Sturgeon Electric California, LLC at the exhibit where we met new people in the industry, reconnected with old friends, recorded podcasts, and participated in the safety conferences. Needless to say, it was an eventful week, and at the end of it all we watched our Sturgeon Electric California/IBEW Local #47 Team achieve 3rd place in the Pole Climb Event. Congratulations to all the remarkable teams who competed! The camaraderie, and brotherhood at the ILR was incredible to be a part of as we watched skilled tradesmen from all over the world showcase their expertise. Looking forward to the next ILR and the chance to reconnect with you all!‚ö° A special thanks to Steve, Dan, and Enoc throughout this rodeo season for all of their dedication and hard work, your efforts truly set the standards for excellence. #MYR #Sturgeon #Culture #Teamwork #LinemansRodeo #ILR #Connections

üåü Exciting Job Opportunity Alert in Chino, California! üåü Are you ready to take your career to new heights? Sturgeon Electric California, LLC is thrilled to announce an incredible job opportunity in Chino, California that you won't want to miss. We're on the lookout for a passionate Electrical Estimator who is eager to join our dynamic workplace, dedicated to a culture of safety and growth. We take pride in our strong culture of leadership that fosters collaboration and teamwork, empowering you to excel. üîå About Sturgeon Electric California, LLC: As part of the MYR Group family of companies, Sturgeon Electric California, LLC, has a long-standing reputation for excellence in electrical construction services. We take pride in delivering cutting-edge solutions to meet the diverse needs of our clients. Our commitment to safety, innovation, and teamwork sets us apart, making us a leading force in the industry. üåü The Opportunity: Position: Estimator - Electrical Construction Location: Chino, California This is not just another job; it's a chance to be part of a team that values your contributions and supports your professional development. At Sturgeon Electric California, LLC, we offer: ‚úÖ A Culture of Safety: Your well-being is our priority, and our commitment to safety is unwavering. ‚úÖ Professional Growth: We provide opportunities for training, mentorship, and career advancement. ‚úÖ Teamwork: Join a collaborative, diverse team where your ideas are heard and your skills are celebrated. ‚úÖ Impactful Projects: Contribute to exciting and innovative projects that make a difference. Interested? To apply for this incredible opportunity, click on the link below. Join us at Sturgeon Electric California, LLC, and be part of a workplace where safety, culture, and career growth go hand in hand. Your journey to success starts here!

Brian Schlenker and Matthew Mendelkow, both Southern California Edison (SCE) Troublemen Supervisors, recently attended the Foreman's meeting held by Sturgeon Electric California, LLC with the objective of highlighting the importance of clear and effective communication. Having Brian and Matthew come out was a great opportunity for our crew leaders to establish a relationship with the Troublemen Supervisors and understand their expectations for seamless operations going forward. We want to thank Brian and Matthew for arriving early to show us how much they value our partnership and teamwork. Their presence was invaluable in promoting effective communication and building the foundation for a successful partnership. #sturgeon #myr #sce #troublemen #foremanmeeting #partnership

I would like to express my gratitude to KnowledgeVine for their exceptional organization of the Human Performance in Action Conference last week. The event was a tremendous learning opportunity for me, both as a representative of our company and as a participant among other outstanding leaders. Many thanks for facilitating growth and meaningful connections! A special acknowledgment goes out to Sturgeon Electric California employees; Paul Salgado, Senior Field Media Advisor, Oscar Amado, Safety Manager, and Steve Lekvold, Journeyman Lineman. Amazing job Paul on leading multiple breakout sessions at the conference your dedication and passion is inspiring! It was a pleasure to have you all at the conference, and I extend my congratulations to Steve and Oscar on their Human Performance Certificate, which demonstrates their expertise in human performance principles. #HPAC #humanperformance #leadership #innovation #ThePowerElementPodcast
